original_title: Once Upon A Time There Was A Kallan
overview: Neelankavil Joseph Kurien is a rich old miser who lives in Thookillangadi. He has two children, who are settled in the Gulf and his wife died a few years back. Joseph is keen that his children return to the village.  One day, a robber Hari happens to enter the house of Joseph. Hari has a special reason in coming to that house, and the moments that occur between Hari and Joseph form the rest of the story.
title: Once Upon A Time There Was A Kallan
